name: Scrambled Schematics
objective: Unscramble the hidden location from the Chaos Crew’s chat to figure out where inside City Zoo they’re planning their next prank.

hints.1: Try using the decoder gadget provided to help with this scrambled message.
hints.2: The scrambled word looks like it’s backwards. Try reversing the letters.

success: Nice work! The Chaos Crew’s target is the Monkey Habitat! You’ve stopped their first prank before it even started!
